ivardefs.name: context
ivardefs.desc: Encounter or Episode with primary association to specified term activity.

ivardefs.name: contextLinkId_
ivardefs.desc: Id [identifier??] of the clause or question text related to the requester of this action in the referenced form or QuestionnaireResponse.

ivardefs.name: doNotPerform
ivardefs.desc: True if the term prohibits the  action.

ivardefs.name: intent
ivardefs.desc: Reason or purpose for the action stipulated by this Contract Provision.

ivardefs.name: linkId_
ivardefs.desc: Id [identifier??] of the clause or question text related to this action in the referenced form or QuestionnaireResponse.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Comments made about the term action made by the requester, performer, subject or other participants.

ivardefs.name: performer
ivardefs.desc: Indicates who or what is being asked to perform (or not perform) the ction.

ivardefs.name: performerLinkId_
ivardefs.desc: Id [identifier??] of the clause or question text related to the reason type or reference of this  action in the referenced form or QuestionnaireResponse.

ivardefs.name: performerRole
ivardefs.desc: The type of role or competency of an individual desired or required to perform or not perform the action.

ivardefs.name: performerType_
ivardefs.desc: The type of individual that is desired or required to perform or not perform the action.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: Rationale for the action to be performed or not performed. Describes why the action is permitted or prohibited.

ivardefs.name: reasonLinkId_
ivardefs.desc: Id [identifier??] of the clause or question text related to the reason type or reference of this  action in the referenced form or QuestionnaireResponse.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies permitting or not permitting this action.

ivardefs.name: reason_
ivardefs.desc: Describes why the action is to be performed or not performed in textual form.

ivardefs.name: requesterLinkId_
ivardefs.desc: Id [identifier??] of the clause or question text related to the requester of this action in the referenced form or QuestionnaireResponse.

ivardefs.name: requester_
ivardefs.desc: Who or what initiated the action and has responsibility for its activation.

ivardefs.name: securityLabelNumber_
ivardefs.desc: Security labels that protects the action.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: Current state of the term action.

ivardefs.name: subject_
ivardefs.desc: Entity of the action.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: Activity or service obligation to be done or not done, performed or not performed, effectuated or not by this Contract term.

properties.desc: An actor taking a role in an activity for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.
